show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Devil Is In The Details

title: The Devil Is In The Details
content:
The simple but basic statistics which the media do not publish or emphasize tell the lie of the ‘economic recovery’. <!--more--> Please listen to learn what they are.
The Ponzi scheme will terminate because there just isn’t enough money to service the gargantuan-sized debt.
There is a finite end to all this, ladies and gentlemen – and we are nearly there.
Meanwhile, the economy is moribund.
The reason for the 5.
9% rate of unemployment.
The introduction of the ‘credit card’ in 1958, the beginning of the most pernicious epoch in all of human economic and financial history.
  Self-indulged parenting, the norm in America… and why it is so wrong.
Alibaba is NOT an ‘investment’.
It’s a bucket-shop gamble.
The scandal of Joan Rivers’s death.
A few companies are offering “pre-cations”, paid vacations to new hires, to ensure that they come onboard refreshed and ready to work hard.
The US Secret Service director resigned after several failures including an armed former felon able to enter an elevator with President Obama.
An EU commissioner says the world is facing the most crises since WW2.
